headline.main: More women accuse Cosby of assault, Gaga to go to Oscars
headline.sub: More women accuse Cosby of assault, Gaga to go to Oscars

docs.snippet: The day's top showbiz news and headlines including two more women accuse Bill Cosby of sexual assault, Lady Gaga will perform at the Oscars, and Pink joins up with PETA. Bob Mezan reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The day's top showbiz news and headlines including two more women accuse Bill Cosby of sexual assault, Lady Gaga will perform at the Oscars, and Pink joins up with PETA. Bob Mezan reports.

headline.main: Lawsuit Against Union Pacific Over Deadly Texas Collision Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit Against Union Pacific Over Deadly Texas Collision Dismissed

docs.snippet: A Texas judge has dismissed a lawsuit against Union Pacific Corp  brought in connection with a 2012 collision between a freight train and a parade float that killed four veterans in Texas....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Texas judge has dismissed a lawsuit against Union Pacific Corp  brought in connection with a 2012 collision between a freight train and a parade float that killed four veterans in Texas.

headline.main: Labour Says Would Extend Bank Bonus Clawback to 10 Years
headline.print_headline: Labour Says Would Extend Bank Bonus Clawback to 10 Years

docs.snippet: Britain's opposition Labour party said on Friday it would extend to at least 10 years the length of time over which miscreant bankers face having their bonuses clawed back if it wins a national election in May....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's opposition Labour party said on Friday it would extend to at least 10 years the length of time over which miscreant bankers face having their bonuses clawed back if it wins a national election in May.

headline.main: California Attorney General Says to Tackle Foster Care Abuse
headline.print_headline: California Attorney General Says to Tackle Foster Care Abuse

docs.snippet: California Attorney General Kamala Harris said on Thursday she would take on the state's troubled foster care system as part of a new initiative to combat crimes related to children and youth....
docs.lead_paragraph: California Attorney General Kamala Harris said on Thursday she would take on the state's troubled foster care system as part of a new initiative to combat crimes related to children and youth.

headline.main: Rights Group: Iran Must Halt Execution of Man Jailed as Teen
headline.print_headline: Rights Group: Iran Must Halt Execution of Man Jailed as Teen

docs.snippet: An Iranian Kurdish man who was arrested when he was 17 years old and alleges he was tortured into confessing has been informed he will be hanged next week, rights group Amnesty International said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Iranian Kurdish man who was arrested when he was 17 years old and alleges he was tortured into confessing has been informed he will be hanged next week, rights group Amnesty International said Friday.

headline.main: Análisis: En Ucrania, el juego es de Putin

docs.snippet: En Minsk, los líderes de Europa se enfrentaron con la realidad de que Vladimir Putin sigue teniendo la ventaja porque está dispuesto a usar la fuerza militar para obtener lo que quiere....

byline.contributor: Alison Smale contribuyó a este reportaje desde Berlín, y Rick Gladstone desde Nueva York.

docs.lead_paragraph: En Minsk, los líderes de Europa se enfrentaron con la realidad de que Vladimir Putin sigue teniendo la ventaja porque está dispuesto a usar la fuerza militar para obtener lo que quiere.

headline.main: Excerpts of Emails Between Disneyland and Health Officials
headline.print_headline: Excerpts of Emails Between Disneyland and Health Officials

docs.snippet: After the measles outbreak became public, Disneyland officials emailed California public health experts asking them to emphasize that such an outbreak could happen anywhere and it was safe to visit the theme park, according to correspondence obtai...
docs.lead_paragraph: After the measles outbreak became public, Disneyland officials emailed California public health experts asking them to emphasize that such an outbreak could happen anywhere and it was safe to visit the theme park, according to correspondence obtained through a public records request.

headline.main: Think Like a Doctor: Swept Off Her Feet Solved

docs.snippet: A college student with chronic headaches who suddenly became too dizzy to walk learned she had postural tachycardia syndrome — also called postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome — a condition in which simply being upright causes lightheaded...
docs.abstract: A college student with chronic headaches who suddenly became too dizzy to walk learned she had postural tachycardia syndrome — also called postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome — a condition in which simply being upright causes lightheadedness and an elevated heart rate.

headline.main: Cybersecurity Prep Seen as Mounting Task for Small U.S. Advisers
headline.print_headline: Cybersecurity Prep Seen as Mounting Task for Small U.S. Advisers

docs.snippet: Financial regulators are increasingly zoning in on brokerages' vulnerability to computer hackers, a focus likely to hit smaller financial services firms especially hard as they try to convince examiners that their safeguards are up to snuff....
docs.lead_paragraph: Financial regulators are increasingly zoning in on brokerages' vulnerability to computer hackers, a focus likely to hit smaller financial services firms especially hard as they try to convince examiners that their safeguards are up to snuff.
